citations.narrative:
The animal building housing the sugar gliders and hedgehogs has a strong ammonia odor and little airflow. The fan/air-
conditioner unit is currently not operational according to the licensee. The ammonia levels can irritate the animals'
respiratory system or eyes. The animal facility shall be provided with fresh air either by means of windows, doors, vents,
fans or air-conditioning so as to minimize odors and drafts. Correct by 4/15/24

The racks/shelves holding the cages housing the sugar gliders and hedgehogs are dirty as is the floor beneath the
enclosures. Cleaning of racks/shelves and floor is necessary to help prevent odors and pests and to help prevent spread
of disease. The animal building and furniture structures within shall be kept clean. Correct by 5/1/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.126(b) 
   
Facilities, indoor. 
The animal building housing the sugar gliders and hedgehogs has a strong ammonia odor and little airflow. The fan/air-
conditioner unit is currently not operational according to the licensee. The ammonia levels can irritate the animals' 
respiratory system or eyes. The animal facility shall be provided with fresh air either by means of windows, doors, vents, 
fans or air-conditioning so as to minimize odors and drafts. Correct by 4/15/24 
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
The racks/shelves holding the cages housing the sugar gliders and hedgehogs are dirty as is the floor beneath the 
enclosures. Cleaning of racks/shelves and floor is necessary to help prevent odors and pests and to help prevent spread 
of disease. The animal building and furniture structures within shall be kept clean. Correct by 5/1/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
